title.rendered: How to find & hire a driver, easily?

content.rendered:
Hire a Driver in the easiest way possible.

Try Helpers Near Me and connect with multiple Private Drivers (or Commercial Drivers) near you today.

Save the trouble of asking everyone for a Driver.

HELPERS NEAR ME (HNM) helps you find & hire legally verified workers near you. The platform uses technology and a lot of groundwork to help you connect directly with workers without any middlemen or commissions. On the other end, HNM helps the underprivileged workers of India find local employment, free of cost, directly from nearby employers like yourself. From time to time, HNM also engages with Government bodies and NGOs to spread the platform’s accessibility to as many workers all over India as possible. 

Hire a Driver – Finding & Hiring a Private Driver for yourself has always been a challenging task for you.

Likewise, if you have a fleet of cabs, finding a Commercial Driver is equally difficult.

It seems even tougher when you need one urgently.

Here are some of the options you must have tried earlier when you wanted to hire a driver in the past:

First, you must have asked your friends & colleagues if they know some Driver who is available and willing to work for you

Second, you might have reached out to your friends’ Drivers in case if they knew any Driver who would be looking for work

Third, you would have probably left your requirement with the nearest security guards you must have come across around your home or office

And fourth, in spite of all this, you would have probably spent a few days in your search, until one fine day, someone showed up on your doorstep or met with you at your office.

By that time, your need to hire a Driver would have become so urgent for you, that you might have ended up hiring the first or the second Driver who met with you.

You would have probably asked him to give you a trial as well.

Once hired, and if you were sort of okay with his work, you would have moved on with your life.

And for the background check, you would have probably just kept a copy of his ID with you.

Until one day, when he left again, for some valid reason as per him, and the whole process gets repeated again for the search of a new Driver.

Come to think about it, the whole process of “find & hire a Driver” that you followed earlier was very time-consuming and taxing.

Not having enough time to find & hire a Driver is not uncommon these days.

With limited options available, you did whatever you could.

Meet Helpers Near Me.

From this day onward, you would never have to worry about how to find & hire a Driver. It would be as simple as it could get.

Furthermore, Helpers Near Me would also take care of the necessary background verification of the Driver in the process.

Just follow these 5 really easy steps, and you should be able to find & hire a Driver, that too near you, within a few minutes.

You can find both, Private Drivers & Commercial Drivers through these steps.

Step 1: Visit Helpers Near Me and follow “Find & Hire now”

Step 2: Enter your search keyword ‘Private Driver’, and submit your request

Step 3: Confirm your location

Step 4: Preview the options available

Step 5: Pay a nominal fee & connect with best-ranked Drivers near you

Here’s how the whole process works:

Step 1: Visit Helpers Near Me and follow “Find & Hire now”

Once you visit Helpers Near Me, you are surely going to find an answer to the challenge of finding and hiring a Driver near you.

The platform details all the reasons why you should try Helpers Near Me when in need of a reliable Driver.

Helpers Near Me also has iOS & Android Apps which makes it easy for you to go through the process

It also helps you find many other Workers listed on the platform – like Babysitter, Cook, Maid, Mali for Domestic needs and Office Boys, Store Keepers, Delivery Boys and many others for a business or an office need.

Step 2: Enter your search keyword and submit your request

Over here you enter your search keyword, “Private Driver” or “Commercial Driver”whoever else you might be looking for.

The App would automatically suggest you relevant keywords based on what you type.

Over here, you also have the option to refer to the detailed list of Workers available on the platform. Helpers Near Me lists about 100+ different profile of Workers who work as Domestic Workers, School Workers, Office Workers, Hospital Workers, Factory Workers and many others.

Step 3: Confirm your location

If you are using the Apps, Helpers Near Me would automatically detect your current location.

The App also allows you to find and hire a Driver in any other location. In this case, you may have to feed the place manually.

And in case if you are using the website for your search, you may have to feed in the area manually.

Once you confirm the location, the platform would automatically search for relevant best-ranked Drivers around your neighbourhood and show you the available result.

To help you easily connect with relevant Drivers, the platform follows a complex algorithm, which ensures you would find the most relevant Drivers from around – one who is the best among the entire lot, has the best rating and are also the most experienced ones.

The results would appear like: “We can connect you to 6 Drivers (5 within 1-km radius & 1 from beyond)

Step 4: Preview the options available

Over here, you would have an option of going through the profiles of the Drivers who were shortlisted in your search result. And you get to see the details before you make the payment.

You can see all the details about the Drivers that the platform has searched for you – like Age, Experience, Address, ID, which all segment of cars he can drive, and also their rating.

Once you tap the “Connect” button, the platform would reflect a nominal fee for connecting with the shortlisted Drivers near you.

The fee is usually nominal – starts with ₹99 only.

Step 5: Pay a nominal fee & connect with best-ranked Drivers near you

Here you would have an option of making the online payment through your Credit or Debit Card, Net Banking or your Paytm account.

Once you have paid the amount, the platform automatically shares with you the details of all the shortlisted 5-6 Drivers.

The particulars capture their Names, Phone numbers, Age, Address, ID details, etc.

Now, this may seem like a lot of words, but in reality, all of this happens very swiftly.

Within 5 minutes, you get connected to the list of best-ranked Drivers near you.

Now, compare this with all the hassle you had to go through when you were looking for a Driver earlier – a lot of references here & there, long wait and in the end only 1-2 Drivers who had knocked your door, etc.

On the contrary, if you try Helpers Near Me, you would save all the trouble you had to go through before for finding and hiring a Driver near you.

Here are 11 compelling reasons why you should try Helpers Near Me when you need to hire a Driver:

1) Convenient, Easy & Organized

Helpers Near Me is an Easier, Simpler & Better way to find & hire Drivers.

5 minutes and just a click of a few buttons, that’s all it takes to find Private or Commercial Drivers at Helpers Near Me.

To find and hire a Driver was never as easier and as organised earlier.

2) Professionally Verified Drivers only

Helpers Near Me follows a 2/3 Step Verification Process for every Driver registered with the platform.

Everyone individual’s ID & Court/Criminal Records are checked in detail at the neighbouring District Courts around their addresses.

Know more about the 2/3 Step Verification Process at Helpers Near Me.

Furthermore, you can also get your current Driver verified by this process. It does not matter if he was hired from Helpers Near Me, or elsewhere.

The primary objective is to help you get proper due diligence done for your Driver before hiring him, or soon after you’ve hired him.

3) Connect with nearby Drivers

At Helpers Near Me, you get an easy answer to “drivers near me”, preferably within 1-5 km of your search location.

4) Speak to multiple Drivers at a time

If available, Helpers Near Me connects you with multiple Drivers from nearby, and not just one or two.

Honestly, who doesn’t prefer choices, more so when you in immediate need to hire Driver.

And moreover, when you would want to hire a Driver permanently, you would always want to meet with a few before deciding who to hire.

To give you enough choice, Helpers Near Me tries to connect you with as many options from around.

5) Find & Hire a Driver at a nominal fee only

At Helpers Near Me, you get to connect with multiple Drivers at a nominal fee only.

There are no additional charges.

Only except when you would want to get access to the person’s background verification report.

But the report is also available to you at a nominal fee of just ₹199/-

So, technically, the entire transaction happens at a nominal fee only.

6) Get best-ranked Drivers from a vast pool of Drivers

A unique rating system allows Helpers Near Me to connect you with the best Drivers from around your search location.

This unique rating system at Helpers Near Me is one of its kind.

The Rating System is designed on a sophisticated algorithm, which ensures you always get the best option.

7) Empowers the Drivers to connect with you directly

Helpers Near Me supports the workers, in finding nearby work opportunities.

The platform does so by connecting the drivers directly with you.

By connecting directly with you, he gets to decide and opt for the work, out of his own will.

No one influences his decision.

Furthermore, the person gets to decide his own salary as well.

In turn, this process helps him take control of his life and his source of income.

The Workers join Helpers Near Me free of cost, and on their free will.

8) No middlemen & commissions in between

At Helpers Near Me, since you get to connect with the Drivers directly, hence, there are no middlemen & commissions in between.

It is a straightforward digital platform that brings you and the workers together, Driver in your case so that you connect and take care of each other’s requirement.

9) The Driver gets to earn his full salary

Every Driver & Worker who gets hired through Helpers Near Me gets an opportunity in their life to earn one’s full salary.

Without having to pay commissions to someone else in between, they get all that they earn.

10) Safe & Secure Payment

Every transaction processed at Helpers Near Me goes through the recognised payment gateways like Paytm, PayU & others.

Your details are entirely secured & protected against any unauthorised transactions.

11) Customer-friendly 100% Refund Policy

Helpers Near Me follows an excellent Customer-friendly 100% Refund policy.

Every transaction that you go through here comes with an assurance of helping you find & hire a Driver or any other worker that you might want to search on the platform.

For every genuine reason, the refunds at Helpers Near Me are processed without any questions asked.

Know more about the Customer-Friendly 100% Refund Policy at Helpers Near Me.

Imagine what this kind of convenience brings to you when you need to find & hire a Driver.

This sort of comfort solves all the trouble that you had to take otherwise to find a Driver.

So, next time when you need to hire a Driver, try Helpers Near Me.

By far, Helpers Near Me is the easiest way you can find a Driver near you.

Along with Drivers, Helpers Near Me also has many other workers registered on its platform, who work at Homes, Offices & Small Businesses. Like Cooks, Drivers, Babysitters, Security Guards, Beauticians for your Parlour business, Helpers for Elders, Car Washers and many other such Helpers.

On one end, HNM helps the underprivileged workers of India find local employment, free of cost, directly from nearby employers like yourself. On the other, the digital infrastructure built around HNM makes it easy, quick, reliable & affordable for anyone to find & hire 100+ profiles of nearby workers.

With a vision to end poverty, forced labour, worker exploitation, and human trafficking, HNM is working towards building an unbiased and inclusive digital ecosystem where the underprivileged workforce of India can join the platform easily and access local employment free of cost, with or without smartphones.

HNM believes having enough local employment opportunities allows the workers to find a better working environment, better salaries and a chance to improve their and their families’ quality of life.

From time to time, HNM also engages with Government bodies and NGOs to make the platform accessible to as many workers in India as possible.
